OMGosh, that's AWESOME, W.  Thanks for posting that info.  i was *just* wishing for that 
again yesterday, along with video capability from the camera.  The hacked phones have 
had both of these features for eons but I never had the nerve to start messing around with 
mine in that way.  I knew I was not technically savvy enough to fix it if something went 
wrong!  LOL.  

Margaret

> I just found that there is now an Application for iPhone to record

> cents. If you have an iPhone, you can click on the App Store button

> with a circle around it) and install it. To purchase it, it's located  
> it the "Top 25 - Top Paid" section.
> 
> You can record for minutes or hours and email recordings too. It was
